p: Leaves of eight L. alba genotypes coded as X(2), X2M1, X6M6, X6MIA, X6M9, X6M13, X6M15, and X10M37 were collected from the germplasm bank located at Agronomic Institute (IAC), Campinas, Brazil (22°54′ latitude S and 47°05′ longitude W). The branches were collected in January 2018 and the leaves were manually separated from the branches and subsequently dried in an oven with air circulation at 40 °C for 48 h up to constant weight.
